scene.name: intro
scene.line: Oh, look. Can you read the date?
Damn, I can't read it either.
It may not have even been current. I remember for a while we had a calendar up that was, like, `years` behind. I think Darryl liked the picture?
"Best Friends." Every month there was a different pair of animals that were friends.
That's adorable. I think I'm going to be sick.
You don't remember that? That weird intern brought it in from home, um ... What was his name?
Oh, you remember, he was always, like ... I mean we would make fun of him for ...
Damn, he's almost completely gone from my brain. So many interns coming and going then, I guess I didn't bother even remembering their names.
I wonder who was working back when this was recorded ... Is there a tape of the monitoring room?
Oh, before we check that out, did she flip the calendar forward or backward?
Oh, weird. They usually flip it backward.
Oh, weird. They usually flip it forward.
